## μμ΅΄μ„± μ¶”κ°€

* Maven

```xml
  <dependency>
   <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
   <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
```

* Gradle

```Gradle
implementation 'org.projectlombok:version'
```
